description: This file defines a mock data service for a beverages distribution management system, providing in-memory CRUD operations for customers, products, and sales orders, primarily for testing or front-end development purposes.

classes.name: MockDataService
classes.description: A service class that holds in-memory mock data and exposes CRUD-like operations for customers, products, and sales orders, extending ChangeNotifier for state management.

methods.name: bootstrap
methods.description: Initializes the mock data with sample customers, products, and orders, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: createCustomer
methods.description: Adds a new customer to the in-memory list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateCustomer
methods.description: Updates an existing customer identified by ID and notifies listeners.

methods.name: deleteCustomer
methods.description: Removes a customer by ID and notifies listeners.

methods.name: createProduct
methods.description: Adds a new product to the in-memory list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateProduct
methods.description: Updates an existing product identified by ID and notifies listeners.

methods.name: deleteProduct
methods.description: Removes a product by ID and notifies listeners.

methods.name: createOrder
methods.description: Adds a new sales order to the in-memory list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateOrder
methods.description: Updates an existing sales order identified by ID and notifies listeners.

methods.name: deleteOrder
methods.description: Removes a sales order by ID and notifies listeners.
